name: Mahi

services.title: Art Direction & Branding
services.description: I design key brand elements such as the logo, color scheme, typography, and other design components that makes your brand stand out from competitors. I can also help with the creation and development of online advertising ideas, with particular focus on their visual appearance.

services.title: Web Design & Development
services.description: I build and optimize your online presence.  Website is the digital entry point into your business and a powerful revenue channel.

aboutpara:
Hi there! I'm Mahesh, a passionate and dedicated web developer with a knack for creating elegant and efficient web solutions. With a strong foundation in both front-end and back-end technologies, I strive to build websites and applications that not only look great but also perform seamlessly.

My journey into web development began with a fascination for technology and a desire to understand how the web works. Over the years, I've honed my skills through continuous learning and hands-on experience. From developing small personal projects to working on complex applications, each step has been a rewarding challenge that has deepened my expertise.

resume.description: I have delivered world-class user experiences to millions of people. Well-versed with React, Javascript, and most of the Web frameworks.
